concept.title: What is addition of numbers?
concept.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn what addition is.

conbody.p: To perform the task of adding numbers, you need to know what addition is. "Addition" means brings two or more things together.
Addition represents a mathematical operation. It is a process of combining two or more numbers to make a new total.
You use the plus (+) button to express the addition operation in the app.
